name: Morgan[BETA]
description:
Welcome to Morgan!

In Morgan, you play a scientist trying to navigate an ever-shifting science facility. Navigate the rooms, find upgrades and kill the final boss.

This is my final major project for my Games Design BA. This project focuses on Gameplay in a repeatable 2D environment with the use of randomisation to create replayability.

Morgan MUST be played with a keyboard and mouse.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Rotate/aim
  • LMB - Shoot
  • Space - Dash

Please note!

  • Morgan is in very early development so does not have all its planned features yet
  • This project is focused on a Design project, not an art project so not everything will have a sprite/ animations.

In progress features

  • Room aesthetic variety
  • Boss A.I - Currently you can just beat him up and he won't retaliate

Feedback

Feedback is always appreciated!
